name: 柯俊宏
objective:
雷射乃 20 世紀三大發明之一，醫用雷射更已廣泛地應用在各個醫學領域。本課程將涵蓋的範圍包括：1. 雷射基本原理；2. 雷射安全標準；3. 雷射與組織的作用關係；4. 雷射在醫學的各種應用；5. 雷射於牙周病的應用；6. 雷射於口腔外科的應用；7. 雷射應用於牙齒美白；8. 低能量雷射的各種應用；9. 雷射實機操作與臨床示範。
The laser is one of the three major items invented in 20th century.  Medical laser applications have been widely used in many fields.  This course will cover: 1. Laser Physics; 2. Safety Standards; 3. Laser-Tissue-Interaction; 4. Laser in Medical Applications; 5. Laser in Periodontology; 6. Laser in Oral Surgery; 7. Laser Assisted Bleaching; 8. Low Level Laser Therapy; 9. Practical Hands-on and Live Demonstration.
